titulo: De-risking renewable fuel technologies through transnational pre-commercial procurement of renewable fuel industrial value chains
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes:Public authorities, industry, technology providers, energy producers and consumers profit from de-risking of cost-effective essential value chains of those renewable fuel technologies that can contribute to domestic commercial fuel production beyond 2030 customized to their needs, from improved access to better financing exploiting synergies across funding schemes, and from more effective market
